0.0.1.name: wordpress/multipurpose-css3-animated-buttons
0.0.1.description:
Multipurpose CSS3 Animated Buttons allow you to select between social media buttons or your own links. Fully customizable social buttons with like, tweet, google+1, pin-it and feedburner counts. Fully customizable links and titles for your buttons. Uses CSS3 Animations. Uses cookies to style visited buttons. Basic settings which covers vital customizations and easy as pie. Advanced settings to enter your custom css and more.
